name: ide-crystal
description: Crystal IDE for Atom and Nuclide.

compilerExecPath.title: Compiler Executable Path
compilerExecPath.description: The path (with excutable) of the Crystal compiler to be run by the IDE in the background. By default the IDE will use the compiler in your path.

artifactsDuringDiagnostics.title: Build Artifacts when Diagnostics
artifactsDuringDiagnostics.description: Should the compiler build artifacts when compiling code for diagnostics.

compilerColorOutput.title: Compiler Color Codes
compilerColorOutput.description: When false the compiler will include ASCII color characters in output for the IDE.

diagnosticsCommand.title: Diagnostics Command
diagnosticsCommand.description: The compiler command used when finding diagnostics.

formatOnSave.title: Format on Save
formatOnSave.description: Run `crystal tool format` each time a file is saved.
